title: Goblet
description: a&c) Inverted bell-shaped cups with deep blue upper portion and milky blue-white rims shading into clear glass; domed foot with white rim and eight white tapered pinwheel forms radiating form base of stems. b) The same except that milky blue-white forms more definite frame around leaf pattern on cup and arched foot is almost fully covered by whitish pinwheel design.
name: Goblet
